question:
Is the following statement something you would say?
"I prefer instant gratification over delayed gratification and I'm not willing to wait to get what I want"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I favor using methods that may take a long time to yield benefits, but eventually have a big payoff"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I tend to look beyond the short-term rewards and pursue long-term gains"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I will act in a way that will allow for greater long term benefits, even if it means having lesser short term benefits"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I would be willing to endure periods of discomfort, hard work, or even substandard living conditions for several years, if it means I achieve big dreams in the future, rather than settling for immediate satisfaction now"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I frequently act impulsively and focus on immediate gratification"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am patient; I am willing to forgo shorter term rewards in favor of increased long term rewards"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I want instant results and I'm not very good at waiting"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am patient enough and willing to plan for and work toward long-term rewards or payoffs"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am willing to invest effort and energy into life‐long goals, rather than prioritize short‐term aims"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"If I save money now, I will be significantly better off in the long term financially, even if this means giving up pleasures in the present"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am patient enough to wait for long-term rewards and recognize that good things take time"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Getting things quickly is important to me"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I like to get immediate payoffs and not have to wait long for things"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I need to see immediate rewards or short-term benefits from my work to stay motivated"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am impatient for immediate results"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I like to have immediate results"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I seek instant gratification"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I strive for immediate rewards rather than long-term payoffs and delayed gratification"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I prefer short-term pleasures to long-term achievements"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"My needs and wants must be satisfied immediately"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Time is on my side – I have patience to wait for what I want and I believe that acting with diligence over the long-term often brings much greater rewards"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"It's important to work steadily towards meeting my goals, even if they take years or decades to achieve"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am happy to be part of long-term projects which yield outcomes over many years or decades"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I focus on quick gains instead of achieving my goals in the long run"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I often seek immediate gratification"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am happy making sacrifices today if it will lead to greater rewards in the long term"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I prefer long-term gains even if it means withstanding short-term pain"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am fine with making sacrificing short-term gains for larger long-term gains"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I often try to get things instantly without paying much attention to long-term implications"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I often act impulsively and expect instant gratification"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I care mostly about the short term, and not so much about what happens in the future"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Instant gratification is what life is all about"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I consider what long-term impact actions will have and am willing to delay immediate benefits for long-term results"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I'm willing to do things for distant future rewards, even if they require some sacrifice in the present"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I have no problem waiting for rewards and is willing to put more value on long-term benefits than short-term enjoyable substitutes"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am very impatient and want things as soon as possible"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am very impatient and often struggle with waiting for what I want"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"Waiting years to achieve a goal is sometimes worthwhile; patience leads to extra rewards"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I need quick results or I lose interest in doing something"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I really can't postpone what I want; I need to have my rewards now"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I care about my future self greatly and am willing to take actions that will benefit my future self, especially if the cost is bourne mainly in the present but the benefits are over the distant future"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am focused primarily on short-term over long-term gains"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am impatient and not willing to work long term for gains"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I have the patience to pursue goals that have pay-offs far in the future"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I prefer investing my money for long-term gains over spending it on short-term satisfaction, even when these gains may take many years to realize"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am patient, and willing to wait long periods of time to achieve my goals"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am always quite impatient to get what I want right away"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I am more concerned about what will happen in the long-term than what will happen in the short-term"

Is the following statement something you would say?
"I generally plan for the long-term and am willing to wait to achieve my goals"
